docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New- York Times: The cost of the Central Park will exceed that of any single Park in the World. It is to be paid for by the industry and labor and profits on the commerce of the City, but principally by the laboring classes of...

headline.main: The Central Park-Views of a Person Opposed to the Whole Project.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New- York Times: The cost of the Central Park will exceed that of any single Park in the World. It is to be paid for by the industry and labor and profits on the commerce of the City, but principally by the laboring classes of our community. The appropriations are levied chiefly upon the real estate of the City, and that is made valuable by the tenants, the working classes.

headline.main: LATEST BY TELEGRAPH.; The Mormons Concentrating and Fortifying. CAPT. MARCY HEARD FROM. Late and Important from Utah. HOSTILE NEWS AGAIN.

docs.lead_paragraph: inst., per U. S. Express to Booneville, says the Salt Lake mall arrived last night, bringing Camp Scott dates to May 29. The mail was seventeen days and a half on the way. At the last accounts, Capt. MARCY was on the -Cherokee trail, two hundred miles from Fort Bridger Colonel HOFFMAN had reached Big Sandy Creek seventy-eight miles from Fort Bridger.

headline.main: STATE AFFAIRS.; The Political Canvass-Candidates for Governor-Interesting New-York Case in the Court of Appeals.

docs.lead_paragraph: The " reorganization " movement, set on foot by by Republicans and Americans, in Erie County, will soon, it is now understood, be seconded in several other counties, with the view of making it general throughout the State. The squabble which certain journals, here and elsewhere, are having over the abstract point whether one name or another shall be given to it, is likely to have no visible effect on the movement itself.

docs.lead_paragraph: A SMASH-UP.--On Wednesday evening a most effectual smash-up occurred upon Harlem-lane. docs.snippet: SAIE OFTHE STEAMSHIPS, HEEMANN AND WASHINGTON. The United States mail stemship Hermann and Washington, owned by the Ocean Steam Navigation Company, were sold yesterday at the Merchantsed Exchange, at auction, at 1 o'clock, by Mr. SIMEON DRAPER.

docs.snippet: The Royal Mail steamship Europa, the advices by which, as telegraphed from Halifax, we published yesterday morning, arrived at Boston at 11 o'clock last night. Her mails will reach this City about 5 o'clock P. M., to-day. The extraordinary session of...

headline.main: NEWS OF THE DAY.The Royal Mail steamship Europa,..

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal Mail steamship Europa, the advices by which, as telegraphed from Halifax, we published yesterday morning, arrived at Boston at 11 o'clock last night. Her mails will reach this City about 5 o'clock P. M., to-day. The extraordinary session of the Senate came to a close yesterday, the President having given notification that he had no further business to be acted upon.
